entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 16 April 2023
